snippet.title: Stop The Bus
snippet.description: Stop the Bus is a spin off from the classic card game played in playgrounds and homes around the world, where the goal is to 'stay on the bus' while playing cards with real players or the AI.  Swap cards with up to 4 players in order to get the best score before someone stops the bus!  The lowest score loses a bus token – lose them all and it's a long walk home - and the last one sitting wins the game and rides home to victory!
